name: A Pet Rock?!
description:
Made for the Virtual Pet Jam.

Programming by tomSh.
Art by basklein.

The concept for the game was inspired by the theme of the jam: "In the zone". We wanted the game to focus on moving between different zones to perform different activities.

The theme also inspired the general aesthetic of the game as "In the zone" also reminded us of exclusion zones and radioactivity, hence a radioactive pet rock.

The game can be played with either the mouse or touchscreen.

We hope you enjoy our little project! Thanks for playing!
